Name: Lucy
largeImageAlt: A blue-nosed pitbull enjoying the outdoors.
description: Lucy is a 3 year old blue nose pitbull. She loves to run, tear up couches, and play fetch.

Name: Gerald
largeImageAlt: A border collie with his tongue hanging out in an attempt to cool himself off.
description: Gerald is a very active young border collie. She loves her stuffed bear to death (literally).

Name: Peanut
description: Peanut is a blue nose pitbull puppy. She is house-trained for her age and will only go inside rarely.

Name: Bork
largeImageAlt: A bulldog happily staring into the camera.
description: Bork is a 4 year old bulldog. He enjoys sleeping, cuddling, and eating.

Name: Baxter
largeImageAlt: A siberian husky smiling at the camera.
description: Baxter is a 2 year old husky. Chasing squirrels is his favorite pasttime.

Name: Caldon
description: Caldon is a 2.5 year old newfoundland. She enjoys sleeping a lot.

Name: Bowen
largeImageAlt: A pomeranian smiling at the camera.
description: Bowen is a 1.5 year old pomeranian. She enjoys running around and barking.

Name: Kate
largeImageAlt: A golden retriever panting at the leaves falling.
description: Kate is a 3 year old golden retriever. She enjoys playing catch and jumping into leaf piles.

Name: Lucky
largeImageAlt: A golden retriever puppy smiling for the treat.
description: Lucky is an 8 month old golden retriever puppy. He is trying to figure out how to live with all that fur.

Name: Max
largeImageAlt: A Dobermann panting at the camera.
description: Max is a 5 year old Dobermann who still enjoys playing fetch but has been sleeping more often than not these days.

Name: Cody
largeImageAlt: A cockapoo with his eyes closed.
description: Cody is a 2 year old cockapoo. Enjoys long walks, even in less than ideal weather.

Name: Noelle
largeImageAlt: A cockapoo staring at the camera.
description: Noelle is a year old cockapoo. She likes chasing squirrels and sitting in your lap.

Name: Lisa
largeImageAlt: A german shepherd smiling at the camera.
description: Lisa is a 3 year old german shepherd. She loves going to the park and swimming.

Name: Liz
largeImageAlt: A labrador retriever staring wistfully into space.
description: Liz is a 6 year old labrador retriever with surprisingly more energy than her age would suggest.
